original_text: I have given you an example. You should do the same for others as I have done for you.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 행한 것 같이 너희도 행하게 하려 하여 본을 보였노라

sentences.original_text: I have given you an example.
for others as I have done for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 해준 것처럼 다른 사람들을 위해.
